item.title: Spencer Cox bio
item.description: Know more about Governor Spencer Cox A sixth-generation Utahn, Gov. Spencer J. Cox was born and raised in Fairview, a town of 1,247 residents located about two hours south of Salt Lake City. He graduated from Snow College, Utah State University and Washington and Lee University School of Law. Cox met Abby Palmer at age 16 and they have been smitten with each other ever since. After Spencerâ€™s service as a missionary in Mexico, the couple married and moved away to continue their education.
